api_key.description: The API Key for the Airtable account. See the Support Guide for more information on how to obtain this key.
api_key.title: API Key

base_id.description: The Base ID to integrate the data from. You can find the Base ID following the link Airtable API, log in to your account, select the base you need and find Base ID in the docs.
base_id.title: Base ID

table_sales_order.description: The Airtable table to store orders data.
table_sales_order.title: Table for orders

table_product_variant.description: The Airtable table to store product variants data.
table_product_variant.title: Table for product variants
